review: I purchased Chromecast when my Roku still wasn't able to stream Youtube as well as for the ability to stream videos from my laptop (Ctrl O).Once I started useing CC I quickly realized that instead of using my phone or laptop as a remote it was just easier to watch YouTube on either of those devices.My second reason for buying was to stream movies from my laptop, but here the constant buffering makes it impossible to stream a movie and watch it in its entirety.I have never had any buffering issues even with my old Roku, while the streaming of YouTube is of similar quality the buffering and lack of a remote makes ChromeCast too much of a pain to use. Granted the Roku is three times the price but at least it works as advertised.
